channel.title: Comments on: Netflix Now Showing Gumby SciFi

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2012/04/03/netflix-now-showing-gumby-scifi/#comment-3947">Elizabeth Scott</a>.
Now if it was Gumby in space I could see a SciFi angle :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Elizabeth Scott.

Now if it was Gumby in space I could see a SciFi angle ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: I think it's leaning more toward the fantasy end rather than sci-fi. Either way, the fact that Gumby is now on Netflix instant streaming is pretty epic.
item.content:encoded: I think it’s leaning more toward the fantasy end rather than sci-fi. Either way, the fact that Gumby is now on Netflix instant streaming is pretty epic.
